title: Public Health Crisis
frame: Families in Prichard live with sewage in their streets and yards, exposing kids and elders to health risks.
why_it_works: Reporters can connect it to readers’ health and safety.

title: Regional Water Quality Risk
frame: Spills in Prichard end up in Three Mile Creek and Mobile Bay, hurting fishing, oysters, and recreation for everyone.
why_it_works: Expands it from a “local” problem to something that affects the whole region — which makes it relevant to more outlets.

title: Taxpayer Waste / Accountability
frame: Utilities are violating permits and taxpayers are footing the bill without seeing results.
why_it_works: Media often jump on waste-of-money stories — it’s a hook that resonates politically and financially.
